Series-SYNOPSIS/PLOT:

❤️‍🔥 “Lover Or Stranger” (2018) – A Chinese Mystery Thriller Romantic Melodrama Television Series – During a trip to Hokkaido, Japan, prominent violinist Luo Qian Yi and her fiancé, Mingyou Group CEO Huo You Ze, encounter a sudden avalanche. You Ze leads the rescue team hoping to find Qian Yi, whose face is now completely destroyed, and the only way to confirm her identity is through her passport. Due to severe head injuries, Qian Yi also losses her memory. Although Luo Qian Yi is a highly talented, young female violinist with the world seemingly at her feet, everything went to naught due to the accident, and now she needs to find herself and her love in the fog of her memories.
